fields.headline: What's on when
fields.bodyText: Up Helly Aa Date : January 30. Location : Hilldead, Lerwick, Shetland Islands, Scotland. Description : Torchlit parade of 800 people, the burning of a Viking galley, and a ceilidh late into the night. Contact : 01595 693434. Website : www.whatsonwhen.com/themes/uphellyaa.jml La Endiablada Date : February 1-2. Location : Almonacid del Marquesado, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain. Description : 100 men prance around the town in devil masks and pyjamas with huge bells hanging off their backsides. Contact : +34 969 234 000. E-mail : ppe.cuenca@citelan.es Website : www.whatsonwhen.com/places/spain.jml Groundhog Day Date : February 2. Location : Punxsutawney, Pennsylvania, US. Description : Weather- predicting woodchuck event on a hill called Gobbler's Knob (really), preceded by all-night party and fireworks. Contact : +1 800 752 7445. E-mail : info@punxsutawney .com Website : www.whatsonwhen.com/places/usa.jml Thaipusam Date : February 7. Location : Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, Singapore. Description : Hindu penitents make a 3km procession carrying metal frames attached to their bodies by a horrific selection of hooks and spikes. E-mail : stb_sog@stb.gov.sg Website : www.whatsonwhen.com/themes/bizarre.jml For more information on these and other events, go to www.whatsonwhen.com
